Description: Founded in 2007, GreenPan is an award-winning, sustainably built, nonstick ceramic cookware line.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Full Description: In 2007, lifelong friends Jan Helskens and Wim De Veirman transformed the ceramic nonstick cookware game with GreenPan. The revolutionary healthy ceramic nonstick cookware line is award-winning, features groundbreaking technology, and is sustainably built and toxin-free (free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium).  We’re the creators of the original healthy ceramic nonstick coating called Thermolon™, which starts with sand. This plastic-free nonstick is the first alternative to traditional nonstick coatings.  Evershine™, an electro-chemical surface treatment, is applied to GreenPan stainless steel cookware to keep it looking brighter and brand new. And our Magneto™ technology, a thick base with copper-reinforced ferromagnetic particles, helps optimize the induction power of any pan.  At GreenPan, we’re committed to a greener future. Our products are crafted in our eco-friendly GreenPan-owned factory and produced with 30% solar power, 60% less CO2 during the curing phase, and at least 70% recycled aluminum (excluding handles). Additionally, our company owns a wastewater management facility to treat and reuse the water used in production.  Our company holds over 150 patents for technological advancements that help make the culinary experience easy for those just starting their cooking journey and those proficient in the kitchen.  GreenPan’s roster of products includes frypans, woks, griddles, Dutch ovens, roasters, ovenware and bakeware, slow cookers, and cutlery.  Our Valencia Pro collection won the 2023 Good Housekeeping Sustainable Innovation Award, Popular Science Best Eco-Friendly Induction Cookware Award, and made The Spruce Eats Best Eco-Friendly Nonstick Cookware Brands list. Likewise, America’s Test Kitchen named GreenPan’s Valencia Pro the Best 12” Ceramic Nonstick Skillet for the fifth year in a row and USA Today’s Reviewed - Best Nonstick Pans of 2023 list included GreenPan’s Valencia Pro Ceramic Nonstick 11” Fry Pan. CNN awarded GreenPan Levels Stackable Ceramic Frypan as Best Eco-Friendly Nonstick Pan of 2023 and GreenPan’s Slow Cooker was honored as Snappy Living’s Best Slow Cooker with a Browning Feature. The Cookware Company, GreenPan’s parent company, has offices across the globe in the United Kingdom, Hong Kong, and New York.
